column2: RECODED EMERGING ISSUES
Len : 1    RC-EVER USED A NEEDLE TO INJECT IMF
0 = No (IMFNDLEVER =2,91 or (IMFNDLEVER^=1 and IMFFLAG=0)) ......................
he following recoded variable, ANYNEDFLAG, was created starting with the 2022 NSDUH to include data from the new questions in the
Emerging Issues section about the use of a needle to inject illegally made fentanyl. ANYNEDFLAG (ever used a needle to inject heroin, cocaine,

column1: methamphetamine, illegally made fentanyl, or some other drug) replaces ANYNEDEVER (ever used a needle to inject heroin, cocaine,
<s>methamphetamine, or some other drug) that appeared in the Recoded Special Drugs section in 2021.</s>

1 = Yes (OTDGNDLRC=1,2,11,12 or any other source variable=1) ..................................
